Item.method_code:
'inDom format: ' <Item type='Method' action='Update Project'> ' <body project_id='PROJECT_ID_VAL'/> ' </Item> ' OR ' <Item type='Project' id='PROJECT_ID_VAL'> ' .... ' </Item>
Dim i As Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim projId As String Dim tmpNd As XmlElement If Me.node.getAttribute("type")="Method" Then tmpNd = CType(Me.node.selectSingleNode("body"), XmlElement) If IsNothing(tmpNd) Then Return i.newError("body is not specified") projId = tmpNd.getAttribute("project_id") Else projId = Me.node.getAttribute("id") End If Dim methNm As String = "PM_fireCustomProjectHook" Return i.applyMethod(methNm, String.Format("<body project_id='{0}' prop_name='update_method'/>", System.Security.SecurityElement.Escape(projId)))
Item.name: Update Project
